item.title: Quarkus Is Insanely Cool
item.description: Quarkus is a Java framework that is crazy fast, compiles to native code and has a dreamy developer experience. üòç I am in love What you so excited about Well. Imagne Spring boot if it started up in a fraction of a second. Imagine if you could not have to worry about running your application on a JVM container. Still confused? Allow me to explain… When you run a Java application in a container you need a JVM container.
